text: Cleaners don't clean, lifts are dirty garden are smelly and full of housefly, swimming pools never clean with milky blurry water , all cleaners always can't be seen cleaning anything anywhere except during tea break lunch and almost 5pm then they all appear . Security guards watching hanphones some chitchats some disappear at their post, the front and side gate all open door to anyone any car without questioning and some guards even sleep on duty.terrible management no control at all. All run wide.where? NORMANTON PARK condo.some cleaners even smoking and spill saliva on roadside busstop Infront of residents, really disgusting.

I've had a very frustrating experience with your poor customer service. The hours-long wait to pick up the call and their rude responses are totally unacceptable. Kingsford, please train your employees to be more polite and helpful to customers. Your property isn't cheap, and we shouldn't receive such lousy service.
Moved to Normanton Park , one of their latest developments . It has So MUCH design faults, can’t even get basics right! BCA needs to come down hard on them…

I am owner of one of their properties, the service is bad and they have no trust. Told me that they ordered materials and will replace my flooring but they dragged out it till the warranty period is over and requested me to pay for the flooring at $80/sqft.

Never buy anything from them!
Cheapo construction but expensive apartments. Don't buy their property else you will regret. Go for reputable ones.
